com.linkedin.platform

Class LISessionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.linkedin.platform.LISessionManager

  • public class LISessionManager
extends java.lang.Object
    LISessionManager manages the authorizations needed for an application to access LinkedIn data and to view LinkedIn profiles. A typical usage flow is: LISessionManager.init(activity, Scope.build(LIPermission.R_BASICPROFILE), callback, true); When callback.onAuthSuccess() is called, calls to APIHelper to retrieve LinkedIn data or calls to DeepLinkHelper can be made to view LinkedIn profiles. LISession.isValid() should be used to validate the session before making api calls or deeplink calls

        Parameters:

      • init

        public void init(android.app.Activity activity,
                 Scope scope,
                 AuthListener callback,
                 boolean showGoToAppStoreDialog)
        Brings the user to an authorization screen which allows the user to authorize the application to access their LinkedIn data. When the user authorizes the application AuthListener.onAuthSuccess() is called. If the user has previously authorized the application, onAuthSuccess will be called without the authorization screen being shown. If there is no user logged into the LinkedIn application, the user will be prompted to login to LinkedIn, after which the authorization screen will be shown. Either this method or init(AccessToken) must be called before the application can make API calls or DeepLink calls.
        Parameters:
        activity - activity to return to after initialization
        scope - The type of LinkedIn data that for which access is requested. see Scope
        callback - listener to execute on completion
        showGoToAppStoreDialog - determines behaviour when the LinkedIn app is not installed if true, a dialog is shown which prompts the user to install the LinkedIn app via the app store. If false, the user is taken directly to the app store.

      • onActivityResult

        public void onActivityResult(android.app.Activity activity,
                             int requestCode,

                             android.content.Intent data)

      • getSession

        public LISession getSession()
        Returns:
        the LISession

      • clearSession

        public void clearSession()
        Clears the session. Calls to retrieve LinkedIn data or to view profiles will no longer work.
